name: dancerarchetype
title: PF2e Dancer Archetype
description: Foundry implementation for the Dancer archetype
author: Archvillain Ediwir

Partnered.label: Partnered
Partnered.description: Some abilities include the Partnered trait. You can only gain the benefits of Partnered Archetype Feats if you and your Dance Partner are both alive, conscious, and can see each other. Both you and your Dance Partner can use Partnered abilities.
